# 计算开拓等级升级所需时间计算
计算升级所需时间

尝试发布PyPI

# Todo
- [ ] 每日任务经验
- [ ] 大月卡体力


# 安装
```
pip install srec
```

# 示例
```python
import srec

current_level = 47
target_level = 70
current_exp = 2470
num_potions = 33
current_stamina = 39

r = srec.Calculate(current_level, target_level, current_exp, num_potions, current_stamina)

print(r.designated_time)
```
